verses.name: Luke 12:8
verses.text: Also I say unto you, Whosoever shall confess me before men, him shall the Son of man also confess before the angels of God:

verses.name: Luke 12:9
verses.text: But he that denieth me before men shall be denied before the angels of God.

verses.name: Luke 12:10
verses.text: And whosoever shall speak a word against the Son of man, it shall be forgiven him: but unto him that blasphemeth against the Holy Ghost it shall not be forgiven.

verses.name: Luke 12:11
verses.text: And when they bring you unto the synagogues, and unto magistrates, and powers, take ye no thought how or what thing ye shall answer, or what ye shall say:
